identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

headings.usage: All section titles, card headers, and impact text.

TargetAudienceCard.description: A high-impact, glassmorphic card with hover-reveal interactions.

TargetAudienceSection.description: The container section for the cards.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'TargetAudienceCard' component exactly as provided in the code snippet.
Ensure 'Oswald' and 'Manrope' fonts are loaded in index.css (already present).
Use the provided image URLs for the respective cards.
Do not modify the color palette; stick to the #0B1120 background.
Ensure the hover effects are smooth (duration-500 or duration-700).
The 'glassmorphism' effect is achieved via Tailwind utility classes in the snippet (backdrop-blur-md, bg-white/5, etc.).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
